code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{FaUserCircle,FaBars}from"react-icons/fa";import"../pages/HomePage.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HostNavbar(){const[dropdownOpen,setDropdownOpen]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const getusername=localStorage.getItem("username");const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem("username");localStorage.removeItem("role");navigate("/");};const toggleDropdown=()=>{setDropdownOpen(!dropdownOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-logo",onClick:()=>navigate("/"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://logos-world.net/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Airbnb-Logo-2014.png",alt:"Airbnb Logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-end",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"welcome-text",children:["Welcome, ",getusername]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-section",onClick:toggleDropdown,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBars,{className:"menu-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUserCircle,{className:"user-icon"}),dropdownOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-dropdown-menu",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})})]})]})]});}export default HostNavbar;
